snippet.title: Portal Fantasy - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2464460/Portal_Fantasy/

Portal Fantasy is a creature capturing RPG full of nostalgia!

It has been 2000 years since the War of the Goddesses - Ravenna is dead, and the Pyli Kingdom has become prosperous once more. Or so it seems...Porbles, the ancient magical beings which inhabit the Wilderness, have suddenly turned on humans. The Portals to Earth are open again. Whispers of the Great Magus Atlantes are on everyone's lips. In this world, it is up to the Heroes and Architects to save the kingdom and solve its mysteries.


ABOUT THE GAME
Portal Fantasy is a pixel adventure RPG game driven by an epic story arc. From the moment gameplay begins, you’ll enter a tale complete with a cast of brave Heroes and Architects with endless questing opportunities. 

Befriend, raise and fight alongside Porbles as you explore the different worlds as a Hero. 
Create and design worlds to be encountered by other players on their journey as an Architect. 

Portal Fantasy brings two roles and revolutionary game mechanics together in a modern twist to this classic genre.

------------------------------­----
Follow Portal Fantasy for more!
------------------------------­----

Website: https://portalfantasy.io
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/portalfantasy
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@portalfantasyio
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PortalFantasyio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/portalfantasy.io/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/portalfantasygame
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/PortalFantasyio/
